introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content:
My name is Youllou, I'm a computer engineering student passionate about software development, cybersecurity, and emerging technologies.
Curious by nature, I enjoy exploring a wide range of fields — from mobile and web development to embedded systems and IoT. Whether it's designing intuitive interfaces, automating complex processes, or building complete systems, I approach each project as an opportunity to learn and innovate.

Through this portfolio, I share the projects that drive me, the competitions that challenge me (especially in cybersecurity), as well as my contributions to both student and personal initiatives.
I always strive to combine technical rigor with creativity, paying close attention to user experience and solution robustness.

Enjoy your visit — and feel free to reach out if you’d like to collaborate or simply connect!
